actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require the Internal Revenue Service to make income tax refunds within 45 days after the tax return is filed.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require that income tax refunds must be made to a taxpayer within 45 days after a tax return is filed.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require the Internal Revenue Service to make income tax refunds within 45 days after the tax return is filed.
